conversation.text: Based on the user's preference cues, I recommend watching Total Recall (1990)). The movie follows a computer programmer named Nick Case who receives an advertisement for a high-tech virtual reality vacation. After accepting the offer, he begins experiencing vivid dreams that seem to be connected to his past experiences. As he continues to experience these vivid dreams, he realizes that they are actually memories from his past life as a military pilot named Paul Callahan. As he confronts his own memories, he realizes that he has been living a lie and that the virtual reality vacation is not what it seems.
